title: Quest Chain Metadata
description: This defines the schema for the metadata supported by Quest Chain System

name.title: The name schema
name.description: This property is the name of the item

description.title: The description schema
description.description: This property is the description of the item in plain text or optionally in markdown

image_url.title: The image_url schema
image_url.description: This property defines an optional image URL for the item

external_url.title: The external_url schema
external_url.description: This property defines an optional external URL that can reference a webpage or external asset of the item
